author: Dana Hedgpeth
title: Live updates: Maryland, Virginia governors blast Trump over protests and virus testing; Hogan grants early release to inmates - The Washington Post
description:
1. Live updates: Maryland, Virginia governors blast Trump over protests and virus testing; Hogan grants early release to inmates  The Washington Post
  2. Trump announces coronavirus testing milestone, says PPP stimulus deal imminent  Fox News
content:
The number of novel coronavirus infections in the District, Maryland and Virginia sailed past 25,000 on Monday morning as the death toll climbed to 996.
The District reported nine new fatalities, including seven women. The racial inequities in deaths also co… [+1513 chars]
